features: REVIVES, SOFTENS AND PROTECTS: OTACI 10 Herbs Conditioner revives, softens and protects your hair from damage.
SMOOTH AND RESILIENT: The most precious oils and extracts of 10 different plants leave your hair smooth and resilient.

HAIR GROWTH: Rosemary is a stimulant, invigorating, firming, circulation-enhancing, anti-dandruff and hair growth-supporting herb, which is also traditionally used for rheumatic pains. Myrtle is an effective herb for acne conditions, while peppermint is cooling and soothing to the skin.

SCALP HEALTH: While sage, laurel and thyme promote hair growth, lavender soothes and calms. Medicinal chamomile reduces inflammation, soothes the scalp and skin, relieves redness. It is a plant that is also used as a wound healer in boils, acne and abscesses.
NATURAL & RELAXES: While sweetgum has relieving and fragrant properties, juniper increases circulation, invigorates, relaxes, is anti-cellulite and is a plant used for oily skin and acne problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A young entrepreneur and a revolutionary scientist, Ph. Niyazi Kurtsan, planted the seeds of 'Kurtsan'​ at a compact pharmacy in Istanbul, 65 years ago with the vision of healing people through the power of nature. At a time when 'herbal medicines'​ and 'natural living'​ were just a dream to many, Ph. Niyazi Kurtsan developed pharmaceuticals, remedies and cosmetics from the miraculous plants of Anatolia, Turkey. Since 1955, Otaci has been an accomplished brand in the natural skincare, cosmetics and pharmaceutical industries. We have significantly contributed to these industries through vigorous and innovative Research and Development with the core objective of utilizing nature to make lives better for the humankind. Otaci aims to protect human health through the healing power of nature. Our vision is to be a global brand that heals people with high-quality herbal products inspired by nature. Otaci is the reliable, premium, local and the most honest natural and herbal alternative to the daily ritual of all personal care & cosmetics. The hills of Isparta in the Mediterranean are surrounded by a cloud of excitement in May. With the sunrise, farmers make their way to rose gardens of Isparta. The iconic 10 Herbs Shampoo and Conditioner that revitalizes your hair with its plant oils and extracts while cleansing it from root to tip, giving it a natural glow and a healthy appearance... Our Founder Ph. Niyazi Kurtsan's first formula, 10 Herbs Shampoo and Hair Conditioner, prepared with plants from Anatolia, contains juniper, sage, rosemary, laurel, thyme, lavender, lemon balm, myrtle, mint, and medicinal chamomile, in addition to the precious sweetgum tree, one of the endemic plants of our country. The shampoo and conditioner deeply cleans, moisturizes, and cares for the hair and makes your hair feel the power of nature with its forest-like scent.

10 Herbs Shampoo and Conditioner is the first formula made by Ph. Niyazi Kurtsan with herbs from Anatolia. The sweetgum tree, which is a precious tree, is one of the endemic plants of Anatolia; it grows in Mugla Koycegiz. Lavender grows in Isparta, Izmir, Canakkale, Kutahya, Afyon and Balikesir and also in Mediterranean countries. Known for its relaxing properties, it is also antiseptic. Laurel frequently grows in the Mediterranean, Aegean, and Marmara regions of Anatolia. Since the oil obtained from bay leaves is a powerful oil, it is diluted in olive oil and used. The forest-reminiscent scent of 10 specially blended herbs brings back the power of nature to your hair.

OTACI 10 Herbs Shampoo cleanses while revitalizing your hair from root to tip with the most precious oils and extracts of 10 different plants, making your hair shining and smooth, thanks to our Founder's unique and pioneer combination of botanicals. The multilayered smells of ten delicately mixed herbs infuse notes of a spring forest into your hair, restoring nature's strength to your hair for a healthier and brighter appearance.

OTACI 10 Herbs Conditioner revives, softens, and protects your hair from damage by utilizing the most valuable oils and extracts from ten different plants, leaving your hair silky and robust. With the oils of the herbs in it, it opens your hair, making it easy to comb and shape, while repairing the breakage and giving it a healthy and shiny appearance. The forest-reminiscent scent of 10 specially blended herbs brings back the power of nature to your hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product detangles well and smells amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This smells wonderful as you use it. You don’t want to leave the shower. It’s like fresh herbs were cut seconds before. Hair was nice and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product has a high viscosity and requires a small amount of shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Yeah...just meh. Just didn't do much for me. You have to pump the heck out of it to get enough fo longer hair. (8). At that rate it will be gone quickly. For me the smell was strong and just lingered in the air like burnt popcorn does. I have long fine hair and this product didn't weigh it down but I seriously wanted to wash it out. I didn't because I wanted to give this product a chance. Don't want to bash this product too hard but the smell of sage is WAY too much and is bothering my sinuses. I have never had sinus issues in my life just in case anyone is wondering. Sorry. I do not 🚫 recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Left my hair shiny and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not at all as described or shown on website very unhappy with this tiny bottle costing so much money
reviews.reviewText: The pictures & description of this product is nothing like what received

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: As of this review I don't know how much this conditioner costs, so I can't consider that in my star rating. I hope it won't cost more than $10.00. I think it's a good conditioner, it has a fairly strong herbal smell when being used, but it rinses out well and the scent is gone. It left my hair nice and soft and easy to comb out while wet. I have medium long, straight hair and finding a good conditioner that allows for easy combing is hard to find. The pump bottle works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent & left hair feeling healthy.
reviews.reviewText: I like conditioners with a nice scent & can honestly say this has an appealing one. It is a combo of earthy & floral. Combed nicely through wet hair & once rinsed, it left hair feeling moisturized. Once dry it felt soft & healthy. It is a nice conditioner that isn’t too heavy and left hair feeling improved. Seems like one that would work for most hair types. I would definitely recommend this conditioner. Reasonably priced too ($8.49 at time of review).
Après 1 mois d'utilisation j'ai vu une super amélioration de mes cheveux. J'en perd 100X moins, je l'utilise en parallèle avec le démêlant Davines. Il laisse une bonne odeur de plantes.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Traumhaft duftend und geschmeidiges Haar: Mein neues Must-have Haarbalsam!"
reviews.reviewText: Dieser Haarbalsam mit angenehmem Duft und weichen Haaren ist wirklich eine fantastische Entdeckung für mich. Der Duft hält lange an und verleiht meinen Haaren eine unglaubliche Geschmeidigkeit. Es ist jetzt ein unverzichtbarer Bestandteil meiner Haarpflegeroutine geworden!
